Comment 6: 
If you follow Alex's advice, you have to open the file first.

However, I would suggest you do the following, then you don't have to open the file.

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	fi, err := os.Stat("bug1.go")
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Println(err)
		return
	}
	fmt.Println(fi.Size)
}

os.Stat function
http://golang.org/pkg/os/#FileInfo.Stat
